notes.title: Authors’ contributions
notes.p: FM conceptualized the study, conducted interviews, data analysis and interpretation. He also drafted the first version of the manuscript. DW analysed the data and reviewed the manuscript. Both DW and T de O provided oversight on the design of the study and data analysis. All authors contributed to the development and revision of draft manuscripts and approved the final version for publication.

sec.title: Authors’ information
sec.p: Farirai Mutenherwa is a PhD student in the School of Applied Human Sciences, University of KwaZulu-Natal, Pietermaritzburg, South Africa and fellow at the KwaZulu-Natal Research Innovation and Sequencing Platform (KRISP).

Douglas Wassenaar is Professor and Director, South African Research Ethics Training Initiative (SARETI) and a consultant to the HIV AIDS Vaccines Ethics Group (HAVEG) in the School of Applied Human Sciences, University of KwaZulu-Natal, Pietermaritzburg, South Africa.

Tulio de Oliveira is Professor in the School of Laboratory Medicine and Medical Sciences, Nelson Mandela School of Medicine, University of KwaZulu-Natal, Durban, South Africa, Research Associate at the Centre for the AIDS Programme of Research in South Africa (CAPRISA) & Director of KwaZulu-Natal Research Innovation and Sequencing Platform (KRISP), School of Laboratory Medicine and Medical Sciences, College of Health Sciences, University of KwaZulu-Natal, Durban, South Africa.
